channel.title: blogdown on Jose M Sallan blog
channel.description: Recent content in blogdown on Jose M Sallan blog

item.title: Blogging with static websites
item.description: This is the first real post of this blog. This is a test post, written to see how the thing works. A wrong picture from a Spanish news TV show. I am using a static website blog because: It allows me to keep my contents in my computer and in my GitHub website. I can build posts including code and output in a variety of languages.
